properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 5 at 9:17AM HST until January 7 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
...WIND ADVISORY FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS UNTIL 6 PM HST TUESDAY...

.Very windy conditions can be expected over the Big Island
summits for the next few days.

* WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Big Island Summits.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Winds this strong will make driving difficult.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Advisory for the summits means that sustained winds of at
least 45 mph, or gusts of at least 55 mph, are expected.
Motorists should use extra caution.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST TUESDAY
